fields.name: Mountain seal control
fields.description: There is an overabundance of mountain seals and the population must be controlled.  Empty Jameson bottles are required for clubbing

fields.name: Banana Cultivation
fields.description: Bannanas need to be peeled for all the monkeys disabled monkeys

fields.name: Jameson required
fields.description: If one doesn't have jam-o, you cant kill seals
